data.title: Euro-Information Code Contest
data.heading: Ranked 11th out of 295
description: <paragraph_t>Competitive programming contest where you have to solve up to 5 algorithmic problems in 2 hours.</paragraph_t>
<paragraph_b>This contest has been organized by Euro-Information, the IT subsidiary of the Crédit Mutuel Group.</paragraph_b>
